accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is closed to researchers.
Access to WAG 254 is restricted until a signed deed of gift is received.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by the Association of Contracting Plumbers of the City of New York was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Association of Contracting Plumbers of the City of New York; WAG 254; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by the Association of Contracting Plumbers of the City of New York, 2001. The accession number associated with this gift is 2001.204.
